snippet: The White House tried to spotlight hopes for working with Prime Minister Narendra Modi while not lavishing full pageantry on a leader who was once barred from entering the United States.
abstract: Pres Obama hosts Indian Prime Min Narendra Modi in meeting intended to repair a strained relationship between their respective nations; talks result in expressions of good will but yield no resolutions to thorny disputes over taxes, trade and civilian nuclear energy cooperation.
lead_paragraph: The White House tried to spotlight hopes for working with Prime Minister Narendra Modi while not lavishing full pageantry on a leader who was once barred from entering the United States.

headline.main: For Obama and Indian Leader, a Friendly Stroll if Not a Full Embrace
headline.print_headline: For Obama and Indian Leader, a Friendly Stroll if Not a Full Embrace
